name: Aratatatt
description:
"Aratatatt" is a simple Endtime Platform Shooter. Damn right! The END is near these days!

I´ve been using FREE SPRITES only - and some character sprites I still had from my other game projects. The soundtrackis something special. I tried to re-create classic 80s Songs to add a little contrast to the game. See if it works! 

The game is basically finished but would need way, way more polishing. I know I dont have the time to do that... So I thought it would be a good idea upload the game here on ITCHIO.

Patreon

Get the game here on itchio or follow & support me on Patreon (starting at 1$) to get this game and many other cool stuff like the games source code, gamedev tutorials, music or cool ILIKESCIFIstuff:

° Game File on Patreon

° Source File (Clickteam Fusion) on Patreon (Coming April 20.)

And of course, if you have any questions about the game or the source code, feel free to ask me anything here!

The Game

This game has been optimized for very (very) old iOS and Android phones back in 2012. It still has all the features (like multitouch, onscreen joystick,...) implemented so feel free to fool around with the engine on your mobile phones as well!
